question:
Arrange the following events chronologically
1. The Partition Plan was put forth by Lord Mount Batten
2. Indian Independence Bill Introduced
3. Indian Independence Bill received Royal assent
4. Indian Independence Bill came into force
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Partition Plan was put forth by Lord Mount Batten on 3rd June 1947. Indian Independence Bill Introduced on 4th July 1947. Indian Independence Bill received Royal assent on 18th July 1947. Indian Independence Bill came into force on 15th August 1947.
